name: Neon One: IQ Brain Puzzle 2025
description: The viral one-line drawing challenge of 2025! Connect dots and draw complex objects like houses, ice cream, and plants in one continuous touch. Sharpen your IQ with 1000+ unique procedural levels that get progressively difficult. No overlapping lines, no lifting your finger. Featuring satisfying neon aesthetics, smooth haptic-style gameplay, and daily brain training. Perfect for puzzle lovers, kids, and adults. Play offline anywhere, anytime. Can you solve the world's hardest single-line puzzles?
short_description: Draw objects in ONE touch! The viral 2025 neon IQ logic challenge.
